name: CQ.Ext.QuickTips
doc:
Provides attractive and customizable tooltips for any element. The QuickTips
singleton is used to...

methods.name: getQuickTip
methods.doc: Gets the single QuickTip instance used to show tips from all registered elements.

methods.name: init
methods.doc: Initialize the global QuickTips instance and prepare any quick tips.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.doc: Returns true if quick tips are enabled, else false.

methods.name: register
methods.doc:
Configures a new quick tip instance and assigns it to a target element.  See
CQ.Ext.QuickTip.regi...

methods.name: unregister
methods.doc: Removes any registered quick tip from the target element and destroys it.
